My Work

Check out some of my projects...

InstaStack
Github

Three week long group project. InstaStack is a rapid prototyping tool used to build projects in less than five minutes with a custom look and feel.
Developed with Javascript, React, Redux, PostgreSQL

Have-Yachts
Github

Week long group project. Have-Yachts is an e-commerce system to sell people boats.
Developed with Javascript, React, Redux, PostgreSQL

Be My Ears
Github

A website used to simplify the lives of people who are hard of hearing. It converts speech to text, text to ASL and will convert ASL to text.
Developed with Javascript, React, Redux, PostgreSQL, Python

Connections
Github

A website that caters to the needs of underserved communities by aggregating already existing tech programs and resources in a clear, friendly and accessible way.

Library
Github

Personal library consits of book summaries. Each book offers different recommendations pertaining to a particular book. Example of recommendations are artiles, books, songs, and movies.
